name: Fart!
frontBottom: SHAME !⟲☝ BR When this card TURNs move it to someone else.
frontTop: SHAME !⟲☝ BR When this card TURNs move it to someone else.

name: Charge
frontBottom: SHAME ✱⟲1▯ BR Everyone TURNs 1 of their cards.
frontTop: PRIDE ✱⟲1▮ BR Pick 1 card type, everyone TURNs that card.

name: Roll
frontBottom: SHAME !▯⟲⇤ BR Whenever your card TURNs, move it to the 1st position.
frontTop: PRIDE !▯⟲↔ BR Whenever your card TURNs, move it to any position.

name: Kick
frontBottom: SHAME ⟲↓▯ ⟲↑▯▯ BR TURN 1 of your cards BLUE and TURN 2 of your cards GOLD.
frontTop: PRIDE ⟲↓▯ ⟲↑▯ BR TURN 1 of your cards DOWN and TURN 1 card UP.

name: Push
frontBottom: SHAME ⯐✱☛▯ BR Pick a position, everyone PASSes a card on that position to the right.
frontTop: PRIDE ⯐✱⟲▯ BR Pick a position, everyone TURNs a card on that position.

name: Grab
frontBottom: SHAME ⟲▯〉 TURN 1 card next to this one.
frontTop: PRIDE ⟲▯〈〉 BR TURN both cards next to this one.
